  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Save Membership"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/user-svc/organization/{organizationId}/user/{userId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Allows an organization admin to add a user to the organization.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Organization ID","in":"path","name":"organizationId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"User ID","in":"path","name":"userId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","title":"user_svc.SaveMembershipRequest"}}},"description":"Add User to Organization Request"}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","title":"user_svc.SaveMembershipResponse"}}},"description":"User added successfully"},"400":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"user_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"Invalid JSON"},"401":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"user_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"user_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"user_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"Organization/User not found"},"500":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"user_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"Internal Server Error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
